uk.ac.uea.framework

Interface Image

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidImage

    public interface Image
    Interface that provides a set of common methods needed for displaying image objects which can be parsed to a Graphics canvas

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispose()
      Recycles the memory used to store the image, effectively disposing of it, as Java garbage disposal is automatic and not efficient for a smartphone framework
      Graphics.ImageFormat getFormat()
      Returns the format of the image as an Graphics.ImageFormat enum object
      int getHeight()
      Returns the height of the image object
      int getWidth()
      Returns the width of the image object

    • Method Detail

      • getWidth

        Returns the width of the image object

        int getHeight()
        Returns the height of the image object
        Returns:
        height

      • getFormat

        Graphics.ImageFormat getFormat()
        Returns the format of the image as an Graphics.ImageFormat enum object
        Returns:
        Image format

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        Recycles the memory used to store the image, effectively disposing of it, as Java garbage disposal is automatic and not efficient for a smartphone framework
